input_output:
name = input('Enter name: ')
print(f'Hello {name}')

with open('file.txt', 'r') as f:
    data = f.read()

data_type_example: INT, VARCHAR(50), FLOAT, DECIMAL(10,2), BOOLEAN, DATE, TIMESTAMP
loop_example:
-- No direct loops in standard SQL
WHILE @counter < 10
BEGIN
    SET @counter = @counter + 1;
END
conditional_example:
SELECT name,
    CASE
        WHEN age < 18 THEN 'Minor'
        WHEN age >= 18 THEN 'Adult'
        ELSE 'Unknown'
    END AS status
FROM users;

function_example: def count_lines(path):\n    with open(path) as f:\n        return len(f.readlines())
array_example: lines = []\nwith open('data.txt') as f:\n    lines = f.readlines()

class_example: class Calculator{public:int add(int a,int b){return a+b;}};

function_example: public double getProfit(int s,int c){return s-c;}

syntax_example: SELECT product, SUM(sales) FROM sales GROUP BY product;
function_example: CREATE FUNCTION getRevenue() RETURNS DECIMAL AS BEGIN RETURN (SELECT SUM(sales) FROM sales); END
conditional_example: CASE WHEN sales>1000 THEN 'High' ELSE 'Low' END
class_example: CREATE TABLE Report(id INT, total DECIMAL);
